content.query:
USE db_gold 
GO 

CREATE OR ALTER PROC CreateSQLServerlessView_gold @ViewName NVARCHAR(100) 
AS 
BEGIN 
    DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX) SET @statement = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW ' + @ViewName + ' AS 
        SELECT 
            * 
        FROM OPENROWSET( 
            BULK ''https://stgadventureworksdev001.dfs.core.windows.net/gld/SalesLT/' + @ViewName + '/'', 
            FORMAT = ''DELTA'' 
        ) AS [result]' 
        
    EXEC (@statement) 
END 
GO
